DOC.brief_title: The Effects Micronutrients Combination With Usual Care Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate impact antioxidant micronutrient supplement marker oxidative stress inflammation well blood sugar control adult age 50 Type 2 diabetes least 3 month . The purpose study see antioxidant reduce oxidative inflammatory state see patient Type 2 diabetes well whether make easy control blood sugar , affect number dosage diabetic medication , and/or reduce risk factor involve long-term diabetes related complication lipid profile carotid intima-media thickness ( CIMT ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients diagnosis Type 2 diabetes least three month duration 2 . 50 year age old 3 . Stable medical status ( e.g. , myocardial infarction , stroke , major surgery , major mental illness previous six month ) 4 . Not take expect take oral glucocorticoid ( except replacement therapy adrenal insufficiency ) , amphetamine , anabolic , weightreducing agent course study 5 . Not receive chemotherapy immunosuppressive therapy 6 . Military healthcare beneficiary 1 . Patients Type 1 diabetes Type 2 diabetes less 3 month duration . 2 . Inability communicate write spoken English 3 . Organ ( kidney , pancreas , liver ) transplant recipient 4 . Individuals likely return followup sponsor likely permanent change station termination service completion protocol 5 . Pregnancy ( Women premenopausal informed pregnancy must rule serum HCG test would like consider participation study . Women hysterectomy menstrual period least one year prior consent consider postmenopausal require serum pregnancy test ) . 6 . Patients routinely take 81 mg aspirin ( ASA ) /day use ASA ASAcontaining product manage chronic condition .
